main.title: Meet the Leaders
main.subheading: Meet many of the local leaders found in this gallery. Learn more about them and what inspires them to reimagine leadership every day.

videos.title: Dr. Paul Baker
videos.description: Meet Paul, executive director at the Contemporary Art Museum Raleigh. Learn how history, church, and family motivate him to be a leader.

videos.title: Carly P. Jones
videos.description: Meet Carly, CEO at Artspace in Raleigh. Learn how her family helped influence her to become the leader she is today.

videos.title: Dr. Tamara Brothers
videos.description: Meet Tamara, director of program outreach and engagement at the NC Department of Natural and Cultural Resources. Listen to her words of wisdom to future leaders.

videos.title: Ali Ingersoll
videos.description: Meet Ali, corporate disability consultant, social impact strategist, and energizer bunny. Hear more about her story and how her dad empowered her to lead others.

videos.title: Victoria Stremel
videos.description: Meet Vicci, a tour guide at the NCMA and former architect. She leads tours in American Sign Language every month. Learn how her parents inspired her as a child.

videos.title: Dexter Wade
videos.description: Meet Dex, a security guard at the NCMA. Listen as he discusses the importance of safety in leadership. See if you can spot him in the galleries.

videos.title: Sanjé James
videos.description: Meet Sanjé, who works with Carly Jones at Artspace. As one of the youngest leaders featured in this exhibition, she gives advice to future leaders.

videos.title: Mickalene Thomas
videos.description: Meet Mickalene, an artist JP met in New York last year. Learn more about her leadership style and artwork.

videos.title: Derrick Adams
videos.description: Meet Derrick, an artist who inspires JP on a regular basis. Watch to learn more about him and his artwork.

videos.title: J. Cole
videos.description: Meet J. Cole, an American rapper and record producer from North Carolina. He inspires people around the world to be creative.
